author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Yongnam Engineering & Constructions (Pte) Ltd and Another v Yeo Wee Kiong and Others
counsel: Leslie Chew SC, Joseph Yeo Swee Teck and Vanessa Yeo (KhattarWong) for the plaintiffs; Tan Kok Quan SC and Ang Wee Tiong (Tan Kok Quan Partnerhsip) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Duties/Client/Plaintiff agreeing to complete construction works in exchange for developer's promise to transfer one floor in development to it/Paramount mortgagee subsequently refusing to discharge mortgage/Whether defendant solicitors negligent in not advising plaintiffs about existence and significance of mortgage/Whether defendant solicitors negligent in failing to advise plaintiffs of unlikelihood of developer paying off mortgage
